description:
Dear Udemy student,

How much will your copywriting skills improve in the next 10 days?

For most people, they aren't going to improve all that much, if at all. They have no plan to improve and continue to struggle. I don't blame them. The sheer amount of things to learn about copywriting can be pretty overwhelming.

What if you were given step-by-step, focused instructions, clear examples AND skill-building assignments, every day, for the next 10 days. Do you think that would help?

Introducing:
“The 10 Day Copywriting Challenge!"

Here's the challenge I'm presenting:

Simply watch the lecture for day one and do the homework. Do the same thing the next day to add on the next vital skill. At the end of 10 days, you will have greater knowledge and skills in:

  • Creating killer headlines (the most important component of sales letters)
  • Price justification techniques
  • Crafting great guarantees
  • Raising and handling objections
  • Creating a sense of urgency
  • Strengthening your proof aspects
  • Product positioning
  • Writing compelling postscripts
  • Generate irresistible calls to action.
  • And much more…

What this course covers:

  • Pre-headline, primary headline, post headline: Where you'll learn to nab attention.
  • Problem: Remind the prospect of their problem.
  • Product: Introduce your product as the solution.
  • Proof: Where you turn the skeptical prospect into a believer
  • Points: Stoking desire for the product.
  • Pull: Closing the sale.
  • Promise: Offering a strong guarantee.
  • Process: Giving your prospect last-minute instructions.
  • Postscript: Reminding the prospect of the benefits.
  • Putting it All Together: Just what it says! You'll even get a template that makes writing sales letters a breeze.

Go ahead and add this course so we can get started!

PS. This course is low priced for a limited time only. I reserve the right to raise it soon. So lock in this course now!
title: The 10 Day Copywriting Challenge
